law.catch_line: Assistance for a qualified distressed county project is available to a qualified distressed county u...
law.text:
Assistance for a qualified distressed county project is available to a qualified distressed county under this subtitle only if:
the county has developed a local strategic plan for economic development in consultation with the municipal corporations located in the county, if any;
the county has submitted the plan to the Secretary for approval; and
the Secretary has approved the plan.
